parameters.name: Presents an object with a text field that contains a warning message (i.e. not enough results, try doing X).
parameters.description: (optional) Presents an object with a text field that contains a warning message (i.e. not enough results, try doing X).

parameters.name:
An array of objects representing groups of recommendations. Each group contains a type such as "recommended," a human-readable (eventually localized) name such as "Recommended Places," and an array items of recommendation objects, which have an ordered list of objects which contain reasons and venue . The reasons are count and items , where each item has a type such as "social" and a message about why this place may be of interest to the acting user. The venues are compact venues that include stats and hereNow data.
We encourage clients to be robust against the introduction or removal of group types by treating the groups as opaque objects to be displayed or by placing unfamiliar groups in a catchall group.
parameters.description:
An array of objects representing groups of recommendations. Each group contains a type such as "recommended," a human-readable (eventually localized) name such as "Recommended Places," and an array items of recommendation objects, which have an ordered list of objects which contain reasons and venue . The reasons are count and items , where each item has a type such as "social" and a message about why this place may be of interest to the acting user. The venues are compact venues that include stats and hereNow data.
We encourage clients to be robust against the introduction or removal of group types by treating the groups as opaque objects to be displayed or by placing unfamiliar groups in a catchall group.

parameters.name: If no radius was specified in the request, presents the radius that was used for the query (based upon the density of venues in the query area).
parameters.description: (optional) If no radius was specified in the request, presents the radius that was used for the query (based upon the density of venues in the query area).

parameters.name: A text name for the location the user searched, e.g. "SoHo".
parameters.description: A text name for the location the user searched, e.g. "SoHo".

parameters.name: A full text name for the location the user searched, e.g. "SoHo, New York".
parameters.description: A full text name for the location the user searched, e.g. "SoHo, New York".

parameters.name: A message to the user based on their current context, e.g. "Suggestions for Tuesday afternoon".
parameters.description: A message to the user based on their current context, e.g. "Suggestions for Tuesday afternoon".
